short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly access your apps from your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the official plugin for Smartlink, your best companion to connect all your apps within your company. Share access to employees by groups and reinforce while simplifying the security for everybody.

Try a demo https://start.vaultys.com/demo
